attributes.action: Update and fund more money into the mental health units
attributes.additional_details: I feel, myself and been in this situation that when a mental health patients seeks out for help, we get sent away and asked to wait for the crisis team to be intouch, this could take up to a week or longer for them to reach out for us, this this the patient time to act, to harm, to overthink, to possible end there life, i feel we get passed around different areas and we have to seek help more than once to be taken seriously, I’ve seen people taken multiple times to hospital but never get any help or advice after
attributes.background: Create more funding, places for mental health patients, to get faster help, better facilities and to stop the stretch of the use of other services like the police and ambulances

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase funding for NHS Adult Mental Health Services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316023

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
